attributes.review: i downloaded the app which then led my phone to transform into a bomb and explode, when this did occur my whole house was blown into pieces my dogs were all caught on fire and died in the tragedy, my whole family is now homeless and i can’t believe this app is even allowed . they also stole my mcdonald’s chicken nuggets when the house blew up.
attributes.title: caused me to be homeless

attributes.review: Not interesting at all. They need to do better .. and plus it’s glitching and it’s just horrible. Waste of space on my phone !

attributes.review: When I got the app and opened it it was a horrifying video of trump spray tanning and that’s not very appropriate I feel as though no one should get this app it’s very horrible
attributes.title: Very very bad 🤧

attributes.review: I downloaded this and suddenly a virus attacked my phone, aliens came down from the sky and my skin started to turn blue. Blue’s a nice color but doesn’t really go with my hair. DELETE THE APP.
attributes.title: app’s for losers

attributes.review: This app gave me stds and made demons come in my house. Help. Take this off the App Store. Before anyone else gets hurt.
attributes.title: Would give it half a star but this as low as it go 😔😪

attributes.review: this app invited demons into my home. every night the oompaloompas come out . i had to move away it got so bad! don’t get this app, it invites satan into your home. my mattresses suddenly turned orange too. PROTECT YOUR DOGS BECAUSE MINE TURNED ORANGE TOO!!
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
